programme.title: Titipo the Little Train
programme.desc: At the train factory, Titipo is learning and practicing running. He is eager to go to the train village, but Teo, the mechanic, says Titipo isn't ready yet. While Teo has gone to repair another train, Titipo secretly sneaks out of the train factory.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: While playing in the garden, Leo and Hero stumble upon a reticulated python and its eggs. The Junior Rangers drive to the rainforest to find a suitable home for the python, but an aggressive hippo makes the task a lot more difficult. Katie identifies a large-beaked bird in the garden as an Australian pelican. The Junior Rangers bring the pelican to a lake and track down the pelican's parents.

programme.title: Super Wings S5: Super Pets
programme.desc: Jett and Jet Pet join a girl, Nanu and her father to look for a lost tiger kitten's mother in the jungle of Dhaka, Bangladesh - where Bengal Tigers live.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Uncle Andrew finds the Power Players and Axel in the house... but doesn't react. What's wrong with Uncle Andrew? The investigation begins...

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher
programme.desc: When Iz sees a poster for a local wrestling House Show, he's determined to go. With Sanjay and Bonemasher's help they conjure up ways to convince Sharon that Iz deserves to go. Unfortunately, someone else has the bright idea about attending.

programme.title: Rise Of The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four mutant turtle brothers go on adventures where they end up tapping into mystic ninja powers.

programme.title: OddBods
programme.desc: The OddBods return for a new season of fun and laughter!

programme.title: Masterchef Junior USA
programme.desc: MasterChef Junior is an American cooking competition involving children from the ages of 8 to 13. The sixth season returns with chefs Gordon Ramsay and Christina Tosi acting as the judges, along Joe Bastianich as the third judge.

programme.desc: Jeff Probst returns to Fiji to host the latest season of Survivor with an all-new group of contestants.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S9 - Hunted
programme.desc: While Lloyd and Nya resist Emperor Garmadon's oppressive hold on Ninjago City, Young Wu and the rest of the Ninja are stranded in a barbaric realm where fierce dragons are being hunted down by Iron Baron and his gang of Dragon Hunters. Lloyd must endure in NINJAGO City, the others need to find the fabled Dragon Armor if they ever hope to get back home to stop Emperor Garmadon once and for all.

programme.title: Power Rangers Super Beast Morphers
programme.desc: Following his first major defeat, Evox has possessed Mayor Daniels and plots to finish what he started with the help of Scrozzle and his new generals, Robo-Blaze and Robo-Roxy. However, once they learn of his return, the Beast Morpher Rangers jump back into action to stop him once-and-for all.

programme.title: Angry Birds
programme.desc: The animation series sees our birdy protagonists battling against the long-suffering Piggies in an engaging world full of surprises!

One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Essence Of India
programme.sub-title: You are what you Eat: Detox the Indian Way
programme.desc: Food in India is swiftly becoming more than just a bunch of elements with lots of spices, cooked and served up in large platters to feed family and friends. A handful of Restaurants are becoming veritable museums, thanks to their new attitude to food. In this episode, interspersed with the budding art museums, we seek out outstanding chefs who emphasize new techniques in Indian food preparation, bringing in a touch of the Japanese and French styles of presenting food.

programme.title: Rachel Allen's Cake Diaries
programme.desc: Cake is about so much more than the traditional celebrations we all recognise. It shouldn't be confined to birthdays and anniversaries. A great cake has a part to play in everyday life. programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Luke reaches the bustling city of Hanoi, where he gives a how-to guide on the vibrant street-food scene. Visiting Ms Hong, he helps prepare a Hanoi favourite - bun cha. He stops off for some yogurt coffee and partakes in an old snake meal ritual with interesting results. Hanoi at night comes alive as Luke prepares a local favourite, cha ca (grilled fish with aromatic herbs), on a street completely dedicated to that particular dish.
